faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is AI Card Designer free to use?
faq.a1: We offer free use of basic features, with premium features and additional generations available with our paid subscription plans.
faq.q2: Can I use the generated cards commercially?
faq.a2: Yes, all cards created using our platform can be used for both personal and commercial purposes without additional licensing.
faq.q3: How can I get the best AI-generated results?
faq.a3: Provide detailed and specific descriptions, including occasion, color preferences, style, and key elements to help the AI generate results that match your expectations.
faq.q4: Can I upload my own images as backgrounds?
faq.a4: Yes, premium users can upload their own images as card backgrounds and add AI-generated elements or edit them directly.
faq.a5: Currently, PNG and JPG formats are supported for export, with PDF and printable formats coming soon.
